title: Request a Copy of a Birth Certificate
description: A citizen needs to order a certified copy of their birth certificate.

tasks.description: Gather the citizen's identifying information (full name, date of birth, parents' names).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the necessary data to locate the vital record.

tasks.description: Verify the citizen's identity and eligibility to receive the document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the citizen's identity against provided documentation.

tasks.description: Process the request and payment, and inform the citizen of the processing and mailing time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent takes payment and submits the order for the certificate.
